parsetree.*:
<root><template><title>RV</title><part><name>type</name>=<value>command

</value></part><part><name>game1</name>=<value> arma3

</value></part><part><name>version1</name>=<value> 2.02

</value></part><part><name>gr1</name>=<value> Program Flow

</value></part><part><name>descr</name>=<value> Skips the current loop iteration, continues with the next one and returns the given value.

</value></part><part><name>s1</name>=<value> [[continueWith]] return

</value></part><part><name>p1</name>=<value> return: [[Anything]] - Value to be returned when iteration is skipped

</value></part><part><name>r1</name>=<value> [[Anything]]

</value></part><part><name>x1</name>=<value> The result of this code will be <template><title>ic</title><part><name index="1"/><value>[2, "TEST", 4]</value></part></template>.
<code>[1, 2, 3] [[apply]] {
	[[if]] (_x == 2) [[then]] {
		[[continueWith]] "TEST";
	} [[else]] {
		_x + 1
	};
};</code>

</value></part><part><name>seealso</name>=<value> [[continue]] [[break]] [[breakWith]]
</value></part></template></root>
